availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles F. Starling (Lt. Col. in the 48th Regiment of Kentucky Militia)

body.p: Served as captain of Captain James H. Holloway's Company in September 1861, called into the U.S. Service by General Robert Arnderson to guard Lock No. 1 on the Green River. Served as lieutenant colonel of the 48th Regiment of Kentucky Militia, resigning in June 1864.

bibl.p: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), 833; KYR-0002-022-0038.
